title: Set up Forgejo ↔ GitHub bidirectional sync
description: Configure bidirectional git sync between Forgejo (primary) and GitHub (mirror). Forgejo is deployed in apexalgo-iad cluster. GitHub provides external visibility and CI/CD. Sync should be automatic on push to either repo. See ADR-014 and ADR-028.
close_reason:
Implementation complete. Changes committed to ardenone-cluster repo:

1. Fixed Forgejo SSH permission issue - added /data/git/.ssh directory to init container
2. Fixed mirror-setup script for multi-owner GitHub repos (jedarden/agent-definitions, ardenone/botburrow-*)
3. Added securityContext (runAsUser: 1000) to Forgejo container

ArgoCD will sync these changes to apexalgo-iad cluster automatically. Once synced:
- Forgejo will be healthy (no permission errors)
- mirror-setup sidecar will configure push mirrors to GitHub
- Repositories will be created as pull mirrors from GitHub on pod restart

Manual verification needed after ArgoCD sync completes.
